text: Conrado Benítez Garcia (19 February 1942 – January 5, 1961) was a Cuban literacy teacher born in Matanzas and was assassinated by the Central Intelligence Agency ordered by president Dwight D. Eisenhower. ==Impact== He became celebrated as one of the martyrs of the Cuban Revolution. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:1961 deaths Category:People from Matanzas Category:20th-century Cuban educators
title: Conrado Benítez
